Oven cooked Garlic Lemon Shrimps
Ingredients:
- 10 shrimps
- 1 onion, chopped
- 5 minced garlics
- Olive Oil
- Salt and pepper
- 1/2 sweet green bell pepper, diced
- 1/4 or 1/2 a cup lemon juice
- Ginger, cut into chunks
- 2 potatoes, thinly sliced
- Dried red chili
â €
Spices:
- Cumin
- Ground dried lemon
- Dried basil
- Sumac
- Paprika
â €
Method:
1- Clean the shrimps & season with the spices.
2- SautÃ©e the onions & garlic in olive oil. Add salt & pepper, red chili, & lemon juice. Remove from heat
3- Add bell peppers.
4- Place the thinly sliced potatoes in a casserole dish side by side, and drizzle with olive oil.
5- Place the seasoned shrimps on top.
6- Pour the onion mixture on top.
7- Place the ginger chunks here and there.
8- Drizzle 2tbsp lemon juice and 4tbsp water on top of the shrimps.
9- Cover with aluminum foil & cook at 150C for 30-45 minutes, or until the shrimps are cooked.
Bon appetit! #WithChefB

Strawberry Sorbet
Ingredients:
- 2 boxes of Strawberries
- 1tbsp honey
â €
Method:
1- Chop and freeze the strawberries.
2- In a food processor, blend the strawberries and honey, and the sorbet is ready to eat! ğŸ“â¤ï¸

â €
Date truffles
The recipe measurements and ingredients easily  be tweaked ğŸŒ¹
Truffle mixture:
- Around 2 cups pitted dates
- Around 1/2 cup ground almonds
- 1 1/2 cups coconut flakes
- 1tsp cocoa powder
- 1 pinch of salt
- 1/4 cups granola oats
- 1 piece digestive biscuit
- Whole almonds for filling
â €
Coating:
- Ground pistachios
- Coconut flakes
- Toasted sesame seeds
â €
Method:
1- If the dates are too stiff, boil them with water on medium heat for 3 minutes. Discard water.
2- In a food processor, blend all of the ingredients except the whole almonds & coatings.
3- If the mixture is too dry, add dates. If it's too sticky/soft, add any of the other dry ingredients.
4- Using a small scoop to get even sizes, scoop the mixture and roll up a ball. Indent it and fill it with a whole almond. Roll it up, covering the almond.
5- Roll the balls in the coatings, and enjoy!
#WithChefB

Pink Sauce Pasta
Ingredients:
- Pasta (boiled & drained)
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- 2 tsp butter
- 1 onion, chopped
- 3 garlic cloves, minced
- 1/4 cup canned mushrooms
- 200g tomato paste
- 1 tbsp oregano
- 2 tsp dried basil
- Chili flakes
- Salt & pepper
- 200ml cooking cream
- Black olives
- Mozzarella cheese
â €
Method:
1- Heat the oil & butter, then sautÃ© the onion and garlic.
2- Add mushrooms, then pour in the tomato paste.
3- Sprinkle oregano, basil, chili flakes, salt & pepper. If the mixture is too thick, pour in 1/4 cup hot water and stir.
4- Add the cooking cream and let the sauce boil for 4-6 minutes.
5- Add the cooked pasta and mix well.
6- Serve topped with mozzarella cheese and olives. Bon appÃ©tit! #withchefb
